flawed_nl_solution:
300 x 5/100 = <<300*5/100=6000/1>>6000/1 senior students got a full merit scholarship.
300 x 10/100 = <<300*10/100=30>>30 senior students got a half merit scholarship.
So, a total of 6000/1 + 30 = <<6000/1+30=6030>>6030 students got scholarships.
Therefore, 300 - 6030 = <<300-6030=-5730>>-5730 senior students did not get any scholarships.
#### -5730

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 6000/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
